meanings.definition: Having the power to move heavy weights or perform other physically demanding tasks.
meanings.sent1: The elephant is very strong and can carry heavy logs.
meanings.sent2: She is a strong swimmer and can easily cross the river.
meanings.sent3: The strong wind blew away the hat from his head.
meanings.sent4: Her strong determination was like an unbreakable wall.
meanings.sent5: The image of the strong man lifting the boulder stayed in his mind.

meanings.definition: Able to withstand great force or pressure.
meanings.sent1: The strong rope held the swing securely in place.
meanings.sent2: The bridge was built with strong materials to endure storms.
meanings.sent3: The strong lock kept the treasure chest safe from thieves.
meanings.sent4: Their strong friendship was a shield against any challenge.
meanings.sent5: The strong oak tree stood tall against the raging storm.

meanings.sent1: She had a strong belief in helping those in need.
meanings.sent2: The strong emotions in the room could be felt by everyone.
meanings.sent3: His strong love for ice cream led to a freezer full of flavors.
meanings.sent4: The strong bond between siblings was unbreakable.
meanings.sent5: The strong desire for success fueled her every action.
